sentences.en: By insensible gradations the last of the alchemists became the first of the experimental philosophers.
sentences.cn: 经过极其缓慢的阶段性变化,最后一批炼金术士成了最早的实验哲学家.

sentences.en: Elinor was very angry, but Marianne seemed entirely insensible of the sting, for she calmly replied.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺怒火中烧, 然而玛丽安娜对这一讽刺却似乎麻木不仁, 因为她的回答很平静.

sentences.en: For many days, Oliver remained insensible to all the goodness of his new friends.
sentences.cn: 一连好几天, 奥立弗的新朋友对他的一番好意,他还是不知不觉.

sentences.en: He fell to the ground, insensible.
sentences.cn: 他跌倒在地，失去了知觉。

sentences.en: He was not insensible to her rosy symmetry.
sentences.cn: 他不可能对她那艳丽的面孔视若无睹.

sentences.en: He was not insolent to his benefactor, he was simply insensible.
sentences.cn: 他对他的恩人并非无礼, 他只是漫不经心.

sentences.en: He was standing, his arms folded , near Rita , who was still insensible.
sentences.cn: 他叉着双手站在丽达的身边, 丽达依旧昏迷着.

sentences.en: In fact, to my eyes, she seemed directly insensible.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 据我看, 她仿佛立刻就不省人事了.

sentences.en: In the martial furry men became insensible to wounds.
sentences.cn: 斗争的怒火会使人不感觉到创伤的痛楚.

sentences.en: In the most insensible or childish minds, there is some train of reflection.
sentences.cn: 在感觉并不敏锐或者最幼稚的心灵上, 也有一连串的回忆.

sentences.en: Is the person in insensible when how to an a bit?
sentences.cn: 人在昏迷的时候怎么打点滴 啊 ?

sentences.en: It was impossible for her to be insensible of Mr. Crawford's change of manners.
sentences.cn: 克劳福特先生态度上的变化,她不可能有所觉察.

sentences.en: My heart should have been so insensible.
sentences.cn: 我的心竟能够那样麻木不仁!

sentences.en: She shouldn't restrain her anger at this insensible attitude of theirs.
sentences.cn: 对他们这种无动于衷的态度,她抑制不住心头的怒火.

sentences.en: The room grew cold by insensible degrees.
sentences.cn: 这房间不知不觉地慢慢地变冷了.

sentences.en: We are not insensible of your kindness.
sentences.cn: 我们并非不知你的好意.

words.tran_cn: 无知觉的；无生命的；无感情的
不知不觉地；徐徐地；极细微地
感觉迟钝；不灵敏性；昏迷

trans.tran_cn: 无知觉的，不知道的，无感觉的，（尤指）无疼痛感觉的
trans.tran_en: unable to feel something or be affected by it
